ygData.msgSnippet: The Oblitercons/Scattershot: The Oblitercons came forward, seeing the little scuffle, drew their weapons. You have one second to leave or die! Dark One

The Oblitercons/Scattershot:



The Oblitercons came forward, seeing the little scuffle, drew their weapons.

"You have one second to leave or die!" Dark One yelled to Icedemon and his 
small, small, insignificant group.

One second passed.

"He's not taking the easy way out!" Breakdown yelled.

"Kill them, kill them all!" Dark One yelled, raising his plasma rifle, firing 
off three bolts at Icedemon's abdomen.

Breakdown fired a grenade from his grenade launcher off at Shocker's chest, 
set to explode on impact.

Pyro raised his flame cannon, firing two fireballs off at Icedemon.

Hiss raised his fusion cannon, firing three fusion blasts off at Falcore's 
pelvis.

Scavenger raised his chain gun, firing off 25 armor-piercing shells off at 
Falcore's chest, pulling it down after 10 rounds had been fired, the rest 
heading at Falcore's abdomen.

---

Scattershot walked on the scene, wearing DeathStorm's head.  He felt 
rejuvinated.  After he had put the hat on.  Raising her automatic rifle, he 
fired 20 explosive shells off at Tritan's sternum.
